qna.q: How do I make a reservation?
qna.a: Choose a hot spring lodge, select the dates and room type, then follow the checkout steps to complete your booking.

qna.q: Can I modify my booking dates or guests?
qna.a: Yes, if the lodge policy allows changes. Go to My Reservations and choose the reservation to request a change.

qna.q: Where can I see my reservations?
qna.a: Open your account menu and go to My Reservations to view, modify, or cancel.
We support major credit/debit cards and local methods. Options may vary by region.
Refunds follow the lodge's cancellation policy. After approval, it may take 3–10 business days to appear in your statement.

qna.q: Can I get a tax invoice or receipt?
qna.a: Yes. You can download a receipt from the reservation detail page after payment.

qna.q: I forgot my password. What should I do?
qna.a: Use the Reset Password link on the sign-in page and check your email for a verification code.
Use the language menu in the header to switch between English and Korean.

qna.q: How do I delete my account?
qna.a: You can request account deletion in Account Settings. Some data may be retained as required by law.
Policies differ by lodge. Check the lodge detail page for free cancellation windows and fees.
We use industry-standard encryption and follow applicable regulations to protect your personal data.
Service fees are generally non-refundable unless required by local regulations.

qna.q: I see an error during checkout.
qna.a: Clear cache/cookies and try again. If the issue persists, send us the screenshot and time of the error.

qna.q: My payment was charged but booking didn’t complete.
qna.a: The booking may be pending. It usually resolves within minutes. If not, contact support with your payment ID.

qna.q: Do you have a mobile app?
qna.a: The web app is fully responsive. Native apps are under consideration.
